warnings: Warnings For external use only When using this product skin irritation and dryness are more likely to occur if you use another topical acne medication at the same time. If irritation occurs, only use one topical acne medication at a time. avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation becomes severe. Keep out of reach of children If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
dosage_administration: Directions Apply to clean skin. Dab onto blemishes, scars, dark spots and other imperfections by using a concealer brush or fingertip. Layer and blend well onto the area(s) needing coverage.
indications: Use for the management of acne
